summary: Wagon train scout Linc Murdock reminisces about his old feud with rancher Rance Macklin over pretty Maria during the time when Linc worked for the Macklin ranch.
cast: Charles Bronson|Susan Oliver|Kurt Russell|Jan Merlin|John Fiedler|Douglas Fowley|Rayford Barnes|Ron Hagerthy|Robert Carricart|Morris Ankrum|Russ Conway|Maurice Wells|Mike De Anda|Susan Flannery|Margarita Cordova|Byron Foulger
keywords: one armed gunfighter|gunfighter|one armed person|arizona territory|arizona
title: Las pistolas del diablo
